<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Triggers a munition such as shells, bullets, missiles, rockets and bombs (''shotSubmunition/shotShell/shotBullet/shotMissile/shotRocket'') as if it did hit. If ammo uses submunition, then creation of submunition will be triggered.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[triggerAmmo]] munition

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> munition: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[triggerAmmo]] bomb1</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getShotParents]] [[Arma 3: Event Handlers#Fired|"Fired" Event Handler]]
</value></part></template>
